products.productName: LG 75inch 4K UHD HDR LED webOS Smart TV
products.description: Kick movie night off the right way with this 75 inches LG UHD 4K TV. With a screen that delivers four times the resolution of Full HD, plus a powerful quad-core processor that enhances picture and sound, this TV optimizes your entertainment to pull you right into the action.

The Roomba 675 robot vacuum makes it easy to keep your home clean, from anywhere. The patented 3-stage cleaning system is specially engineered to loosen, lift, and suction everything from small particles to large debris from carpets and hard floors.

products.productName: Dyson Cyclone V10 Motorhead Cordless Stick Vacuum - Iron/Red
products.description: The Dyson Cyclone V10 Motorhead Cordless Stick Vacuum offers the suction of a corded vacuum in a cord-free design. Free your house of the dirt, dust, hair, and whatever else your family drags in with the ease and convenience of not having to drag around a huge vacuum.
